HELLO_GUEST.3: Welcome! Be part of the experience.

PHRASES.1: Draw shapes, we’ll solve them for you.
PHRASES.3: Latex formulas? We’ll handle the math.
PHRASES.5: AI and algorithms do the hard work.
PHRASES.7: From sketch to solution in seconds.
PHRASES.8: Focus on creativity, not on solving.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: The application provides help in solving mathematical problems
ABOUT.SOURCELINK: The app is free for personal use and open source at the link:

FIRST.TITLE: Automatic Calculation
FIRST.DESCRIPTION: Solve complex math and geometry problems instantly with accurate results, saving you time and effort.

SECOND.TITLE: Algebra & Geometry Support
SECOND.DESCRIPTION: Work seamlessly with algebraic equations, geometric constructions, and advanced formulas all in one place.

THIRD.TITLE: Step-by-Step Solutions
THIRD.DESCRIPTION: Learn how problems are solved with detailed step-by-step explanations. Track your learning progress easily.

FOURTH.TITLE: User-Friendly Interface
FOURTH.DESCRIPTION: Intuitive and sleek design allows smooth navigation and quick access to all features without distractions.

FIFTH.TITLE: Open-Source & Customizable
FIFTH.DESCRIPTION: Fully open-source, allowing developers to contribute, customize, and extend functionality for any purpose.

START.TITLE: Try our app
START.DESCRIPTION: The first attempt per day is free for users without authorization.

LINE.CHANGE_LENGTH: Change the length of the selected line

FIGURE.SELECT_LINE: Select a line within the figure
FIGURE.SELECT_ANGLE: Select an angle within the figure

TRIANGLE.DRAWHEIGHT: Draw the height of the triangle
TRIANGLE.DRAWMEDIAN: Draw the median of the triangle
TRIANGLE.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the triangle

ELLIPSE.DRAWRADIUS: Draw the radius of the ellipse
ELLIPSE.DRAWDIAMETER: Draw the diameter of the ellipse

RECTANGLE.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the rectangle

RHOMBUS.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the rhombus
RHOMBUS.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the rhombus

TRAPEZOID.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the trapezoid
TRAPEZOID.DRAWMIDLINE: Draw the midline of the trapezoid
TRAPEZOID.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the trapezoid

PARALLELOGRAM.DRAWDIAGONAL: Draw the diagonal of the parallelogram
PARALLELOGRAM.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the parallelogram

POLYGON.MARKANGLES: Mark the angles of the polygon

ERRORS.INVALID_SIDES_NUMBER: Invalid number of sides. The value must be an integer greater than or equal to 3.

LENGTH.INCORRECT: Invalid line length. Only numbers, 'x', 'y', or '?' are allowed.

ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.NOT_AUTHORIZED: Authorization is required to rate the solution.
ERROR.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred. Try again later.
ERROR.NOT_TASK_CREATOR: Only the task creator can rate this solution.
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED: Authorization error on the server side. Please try again later.

WARNING.TITLE: Warning
WARNING.RATED: Rating can only be submitted once.

Placeholder editing mode is enabled for the selected element.

To exit the editing mode, click the button below or press ESC/Enter.

ERRORS.TRY_AGAIN:
Try again after {{time}}.
If you don't want to wait, please log in using the buttons above.

CANVAS.FEATURE_DISABLED: This functionality is not supported in the current version of the product.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our application.
PRIVACY.COLLECTED_DATA_TEXT: We collect various types of information from you, including your email address, login credentials, geolocation data, and user-provided images (avatars). This helps us personalize your experience and provide our services effectively.
PRIVACY.USE_OF_DATA_TEXT: Your data is used to operate and improve the application, including enabling account management, customizing content, providing customer support, analyzing usage trends, and ensuring compliance with applicable laws.
PRIVACY.DATA_SHARING_TEXT: We do not sell your personal data. We only share it with third parties where strictly necessary for technical purposes (e.g., determining location by IP for localization, hosting, analytics).
PRIVACY.STORAGE_DURATION_TEXT: We store your data only for as long as it is necessary to provide our services or as required by law. You can request deletion of your data at any time.
PRIVACY.INTERNATIONAL_TEXT: Your information may be stored and processed on servers located outside your country of residence. By using the application, you consent to such transfers, which may be subject to different data protection laws.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: We may use cookies or similar technologies to enhance your user experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized features. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
PRIVACY.USER_RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also withdraw consent for processing at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us at the email below.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: We implement industry-standard security measures, including encryption and restricted access, to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
PRIVACY.CHILDREN_TEXT: Our application is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware of such data, it will be deleted immediately.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be communicated where appropriate.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: For questions or concerns about your data, please contact us at kimrenny.tech@gmail.com.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.INTRO: Welcome to GMHelper. By using this application, you agree to the following Terms. If you do not agree with them, please stop using the application.
TERMS.GENERAL_TEXT: GMHelper is intended to help users with various tasks related to its functionality. The application may only be used in accordance with these Terms and applicable law.
TERMS.AGE_TEXT: The application may be used by individuals over the age of 13. If you are between 13 and 18 years old, usage is allowed only with the consent of a parent or legal guardian. Users under the age of 13 are not allowed to use the application.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_TEXT: No more than 2 accounts may be registered on a single device. It is prohibited to use someone else's account or attempt to gain access to it. Users are responsible for keeping their account credentials safe. GMHelper reserves the right to suspend or permanently delete accounts that violate these rules.
TERMS.CONTENT_TEXT: Users are responsible for the content they upload (e.g., profile images). Any illegal, offensive, or harmful content is strictly prohibited and may result in account termination without refund.
TERMS.SUBSCRIPTIONS_TEXT: GMHelper is provided free of charge, but may offer optional paid features or subscriptions. All paid features are optional and not required to use the application. Refunds are only possible in cases provided by applicable law. Accounts terminated due to serious violations are not eligible for refunds.
TERMS.PROHIBITED_TEXT: You are prohibited from engaging in illegal activities while using the application, attempting to bypass security systems, using the application for purposes that violate the laws of your country of residence, or distributing malicious software through the application.
TERMS.LIABILITY_TEXT: Users are responsible for all actions performed through their accounts. GMHelper is not liable for failures caused by third-party services, technical issues beyond our control, or actions of other users.
TERMS.JURISDICTION_TEXT: These Terms are governed by applicable international standards and, where necessary, the laws of the country of the application's owner. Any disputes shall be resolved under the jurisdiction chosen by the owner of GMHelper.
TERMS.CHANGES_TEXT: GMHelper reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be notified of changes through the application or by other available means.
TERMS.CONTACT_TEXT: For any questions, please contact GMHelper support at kimrenny.tech@gmail.com.
